sense.def:
A tragedy
je izjemno žalosten dogodek ali okoliščine.

seg.quote: The change of flight plans was the principal cause of the tragedy.
When tensions are so high, tragedy is inevitable.

sense.def:
Tragedy
je zvrst književnosti, zlasti dramske, ki je resna in žalostna ter se pogosto konča s smrtjo glavnega junaka.

seg.quote: She acted brilliantly in Greek tragedy.
